attributes.action: Stop the Americanisation of our schools
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Although Microsoft's new Vista is issued in 34 languages, there does not appear to be a UK English edition. For example, Sweden's 8 million population have a Swedish language edition. I have just witnessed the UK edition (for 60 million population) and it is completely American in its spelling; Welcome Center, Color, Program, Favorites, Security Center and Personalize are examples.
Once this is introduced into schools, a whole generation will grow up assuming these are correct spellings for this country.
Please ask Bill Gates for a specific UK edition.
